Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities

Interface Removable

All Superinterfaces:
GameNode
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, CompositeEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicCompositeEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, RectangleEntity, ShapeEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
public interface Removable extends GameNode
A Removable denotes an Object, most likely an YaegerEntity, that is eligible for removing from its parent.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    notifyRemove()
    Send a Event to notify all Listeners that this Removable should be removed.
    void
    remove()
    Perform all necessary actions to remove the entity.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.GameNode

    getNode

      void remove()
      Perform all necessary actions to remove the entity.

    • notifyRemove

      default void notifyRemove()
      Send a Event to notify all Listeners that this Removable should be removed.
